◆ _IsWithinDist()

bool WorldObject::_IsWithinDist ( WorldObject const *  obj,
float  dist2compare,
bool  is3D,
bool  incOwnRadius = true,
bool  incTargetRadius = true 
) const
privatevirtual

Reimplemented in GameObject.

1229{
1230 float maxdist = dist2compare;
1231 if (incOwnRadius)
1232 maxdist += GetObjectSize();
1233
1234 if (incTargetRadius)
1235 maxdist += obj->GetObjectSize();
1236
1237 if (m_transport && obj->GetTransport() && obj->GetTransport()->GetGUID() == m_transport->GetGUID())
1238 {
1239 float dtx = m_movementInfo.transport.pos.m_positionX - obj->m_movementInfo.transport.pos.m_positionX;
1240 float dty = m_movementInfo.transport.pos.m_positionY - obj->m_movementInfo.transport.pos.m_positionY;
1241 float disttsq = dtx * dtx + dty * dty;
1242 if (is3D)
1243 {
1244 float dtz = m_movementInfo.transport.pos.m_positionZ - obj->m_movementInfo.transport.pos.m_positionZ;
1245 disttsq += dtz * dtz;
1246 }
1247 return disttsq < (maxdist * maxdist);
1248 }
1249
1250 float dx = GetPositionX() - obj->GetPositionX();
1251 float dy = GetPositionY() - obj->GetPositionY();
1252 float distsq = dx * dx + dy * dy;
1253 if (is3D)
1254 {
1255 float dz = GetPositionZ() - obj->GetPositionZ();
1256 distsq += dz * dz;
1257 }
1258
1259 return distsq < maxdist * maxdist;
1260}

◆ AddToNotify()

void WorldObject::AddToNotify ( uint16  f)
2965{
2966 if (!(m_notifyflags & f))
2967 if (Unit* u = ToUnit())
2968 {
2969 if (f & NOTIFY_VISIBILITY_CHANGED)
2970 {
2971 uint32 EVENT_VISIBILITY_DELAY = u->FindMap() ? DynamicVisibilityMgr::GetVisibilityNotifyDelay(u->FindMap()->GetEntry()->map_type) : 1000;
2972
2973 uint32 diff = getMSTimeDiff(u->m_last_notify_mstime, GameTime::GetGameTimeMS().count());
2974 if (diff >= EVENT_VISIBILITY_DELAY / 2)
2975 EVENT_VISIBILITY_DELAY /= 2;
2976 else
2977 EVENT_VISIBILITY_DELAY -= diff;
2978 u->m_delayed_unit_relocation_timer = EVENT_VISIBILITY_DELAY;
2979 u->m_last_notify_mstime = GameTime::GetGameTimeMS().count() + EVENT_VISIBILITY_DELAY - 1;
2980 }
2981 else if (f & NOTIFY_AI_RELOCATION)
2982 {
2983 u->m_delayed_unit_ai_notify_timer = u->FindMap() ? DynamicVisibilityMgr::GetAINotifyDelay(u->FindMap()->GetEntry()->map_type) : 500;
2984 }
2985
2986 m_notifyflags |= f;
2987 }
2988}

◆ CanDetect()

bool WorldObject::CanDetect ( WorldObject const *  obj,
bool  ignoreStealth,
bool  checkClient,
bool  checkAlert = false 
) const
private
1884{
1885 WorldObject const* seer = this;
1886
1887 // Pets don't have detection, they use the detection of their masters
1888 if (Unit const* thisUnit = ToUnit())
1889 if (Unit* controller = thisUnit->GetCharmerOrOwner())
1890 seer = controller;
1891
1892 if (obj->IsAlwaysDetectableFor(seer) || GetEntry() == WORLD_TRIGGER) // xinef: World Trigger can detect all objects, used for wild gameobjects without owner!
1893 return true;
1894
1895 if (!ignoreStealth)
1896 {
1897 if (!seer->CanDetectInvisibilityOf(obj)) // xinef: added ignoreStealth, allow AoE spells to hit invisible targets!
1898 {
1899 return false;
1900 }
1901
1902 if (!seer->CanDetectStealthOf(obj, checkAlert))
1903 {
1904 // xinef: ignore units players have at client, this cant be cheated!
1905 if (checkClient)
1906 {
1907 if (!IsPlayer() || !ToPlayer()->HaveAtClient(obj))
1908 return false;
1909 }
1910 else
1911 return false;
1912 }
1913 }
1914
1915 return true;
1916}
WORLD_TRIGGER
#define WORLD_TRIGGER

◆ CanDetectInvisibilityOf()

bool WorldObject::CanDetectInvisibilityOf ( WorldObject const *  obj) const
private
1919{
1920 uint32 mask = obj->m_invisibility.GetFlags() & m_invisibilityDetect.GetFlags();
1921 // xinef: include invisible flags of caster in the mask, 2 invisible objects should be able to detect eachother
1922 mask |= obj->m_invisibility.GetFlags() & m_invisibility.GetFlags();
1923
1924 // Check for not detected types
1925 if (mask != obj->m_invisibility.GetFlags())
1926 return false;
1927
1928 // It isn't possible in invisibility to detect something that can't detect the invisible object
1929 // (it's at least true for spell: 66)
1930 // It seems like that only Units are affected by this check (couldn't see arena doors with preparation invisibility)
1931 if (obj->ToUnit())
1932 {
1933 // Permanently invisible creatures should be able to engage non-invisible targets.
1934 // ex. Skulking Witch (20882) / Greater Invisibility (16380)
1935 bool isPermInvisibleCreature = false;
1936 if (Creature const* baseObj = ToCreature())
1937 {
1938 Unit::AuraEffectList const& auraEffects = baseObj->GetAuraEffectsByType(SPELL_AURA_MOD_INVISIBILITY);
1939 for (AuraEffect* const effect : auraEffects)
1940 {
1941 if (SpellInfo const* spell = effect->GetSpellInfo())
1942 {
1943 if (spell->GetMaxDuration() == -1)
1944 {
1945 isPermInvisibleCreature = true;
1946 }
1947 }
1948 }
1949 }
1950
1951 if (!isPermInvisibleCreature)
1952 {
1953 uint32 objMask = m_invisibility.GetFlags() & obj->m_invisibilityDetect.GetFlags();
1954 // xinef: include invisible flags of caster in the mask, 2 invisible objects should be able to detect eachother
1955 objMask |= m_invisibility.GetFlags() & obj->m_invisibility.GetFlags();
1956 if (objMask != m_invisibility.GetFlags())
1957 return false;
1958 }
1959 }
1960
1961 for (uint32 i = 0; i < TOTAL_INVISIBILITY_TYPES; ++i)
1962 {
1963 if (!(mask & (1 << i)))
1964 continue;
1965
1966 // xinef: visible for the same invisibility type:
1967 if (m_invisibility.GetValue(InvisibilityType(i)) && obj->m_invisibility.GetValue(InvisibilityType(i)))
1968 continue;
1969
1970 int32 objInvisibilityValue = obj->m_invisibility.GetValue(InvisibilityType(i));
1971 int32 ownInvisibilityDetectValue = m_invisibilityDetect.GetValue(InvisibilityType(i));
1972
1973 // Too low value to detect
1974 if (ownInvisibilityDetectValue < objInvisibilityValue)
1975 return false;
1976 }
1977
1978 return true;
1979}
int32
std::int32_t int32
Definition Define.h:103
InvisibilityType
InvisibilityType
Definition SharedDefines.h:1265
TOTAL_INVISIBILITY_TYPES
@ TOTAL_INVISIBILITY_TYPES
Definition SharedDefines.h:1279
SPELL_AURA_MOD_INVISIBILITY
@ SPELL_AURA_MOD_INVISIBILITY
Definition SpellAuraDefines.h:81

Definition SpellAuraEffects.h:39

References FlaggedValuesArray32< T_VALUES, T_FLAGS, FLAG_TYPE, ARRAY_SIZE >::GetFlags(), FlaggedValuesArray32< T_VALUES, T_FLAGS, FLAG_TYPE, ARRAY_SIZE >::GetValue(), m_invisibility, m_invisibilityDetect, SPELL_AURA_MOD_INVISIBILITY, Object::ToCreature(), TOTAL_INVISIBILITY_TYPES, and Object::ToUnit().

Referenced by CanDetect().

◆ CanDetectStealthOf()

bool WorldObject::CanDetectStealthOf ( WorldObject const *  obj,
bool  checkAlert = false 
) const
private
1982{
1983 // Combat reach is the minimal distance (both in front and behind),
1984 // and it is also used in the range calculation.
1985 // One stealth point increases the visibility range by 0.3 yard.
1986
1987 if (!obj->m_stealth.GetFlags())
1988 return true;
1989
1990 // dead players shouldnt be able to detect stealth on arenas
1991 if (isType(TYPEMASK_PLAYER))
1992 if (!ToPlayer()->IsAlive())
1993 return false;
1994
1995 float distance = GetExactDist(obj);
1996 float combatReach = 0.0f;
1997
1998 if (IsUnit())
1999 combatReach = ((Unit*)this)->GetCombatReach();
2000
2001 if (distance < combatReach)
2002 return true;
2003
2004 if (!HasInArc(M_PI, obj))
2005 return false;
2006
2007 for (uint32 i = 0; i < TOTAL_STEALTH_TYPES; ++i)
2008 {
2009 if (!(obj->m_stealth.GetFlags() & (1 << i)))
2010 continue;
2011
2012 if (IsUnit())
2013 if (((Unit*)this)->HasAuraTypeWithMiscvalue(SPELL_AURA_DETECT_STEALTH, i))
2014 return true;
2015
2016 // Starting points
2017 int32 detectionValue = 30;
2018
2019 // Level difference: 5 point / level, starting from level 1.
2020 // There may be spells for this and the starting points too, but
2021 // not in the DBCs of the client.
2022 detectionValue += int32(getLevelForTarget(obj) - 1) * 5;
2023
2024 // Apply modifiers
2025 detectionValue += m_stealthDetect.GetValue(StealthType(i));
2026 if (obj->isType(TYPEMASK_GAMEOBJECT))
2027 {
2028 detectionValue += 30; // pussywizard: increase detection range for gameobjects (ie. traps)
2029 if (Unit* owner = ((GameObject*)obj)->GetOwner())
2030 detectionValue -= int32(owner->getLevelForTarget(this) - 1) * 5;
2031 }
2032
2033 detectionValue -= obj->m_stealth.GetValue(StealthType(i));
2034
2035 // Calculate max distance
2036 float visibilityRange = float(detectionValue) * 0.3f + combatReach;
2037
2038 Unit const* unit = ToUnit();
2039
2040 // If this unit is an NPC then player detect range doesn't apply
2041 if (unit && unit->IsPlayer() && visibilityRange > MAX_PLAYER_STEALTH_DETECT_RANGE)
2042 visibilityRange = MAX_PLAYER_STEALTH_DETECT_RANGE;
2043
2044 if (checkAlert)
2045 visibilityRange += (visibilityRange * 0.08f) + 1.5f;
2046
2047 Unit const* targetUnit = obj->ToUnit();
2048
2049 // If checking for alert, and creature's visibility range is greater than aggro distance, No alert
2050 if (checkAlert && unit && unit->ToCreature() && visibilityRange >= unit->ToCreature()->GetAttackDistance(targetUnit) + unit->ToCreature()->m_CombatDistance)
2051 return false;
2052
2053 if (distance > visibilityRange)
2054 return false;
2055 }
2056
2057 return true;
2058}
TYPEMASK_GAMEOBJECT
@ TYPEMASK_GAMEOBJECT
Definition ObjectGuid.h:51
TYPEMASK_PLAYER
@ TYPEMASK_PLAYER
Definition ObjectGuid.h:50
StealthType
StealthType
Definition SharedDefines.h:1257
TOTAL_STEALTH_TYPES
@ TOTAL_STEALTH_TYPES
Definition SharedDefines.h:1261
SPELL_AURA_DETECT_STEALTH
@ SPELL_AURA_DETECT_STEALTH
Definition SpellAuraDefines.h:291
MAX_PLAYER_STEALTH_DETECT_RANGE
#define MAX_PLAYER_STEALTH_DETECT_RANGE
Definition Unit.h:628
Creature::GetAttackDistance
float GetAttackDistance(Unit const *player) const
Definition Creature.cpp:3433
Creature::m_CombatDistance
float m_CombatDistance
Definition Creature.h:373
GameObject
Definition GameObject.h:120
Object::IsUnit
bool IsUnit() const
Definition Object.h:208
Object::isType
bool isType(uint16 mask) const
Definition Object.h:129
WorldObject::m_stealthDetect
FlaggedValuesArray32< int32, uint32, StealthType, TOTAL_STEALTH_TYPES > m_stealthDetect
Definition Object.h:607
WorldObject::m_stealth
FlaggedValuesArray32< int32, uint32, StealthType, TOTAL_STEALTH_TYPES > m_stealth
Definition Object.h:606
WorldObject::getLevelForTarget
virtual uint8 getLevelForTarget(WorldObject const *) const
Definition Object.h:564
Position::GetExactDist
float GetExactDist(float x, float y, float z) const
Definition Position.h:182

◆ CanSeeOrDetect()

bool WorldObject::CanSeeOrDetect ( WorldObject const *  obj,
bool  ignoreStealth = false,
bool  distanceCheck = false,
bool  checkAlert = false 
) const
1727{
1728 if (this == obj)
1729 return true;
1730
1731 if (CanNeverSee(obj))
1732 return false;
1733
1734 if (obj->IsAlwaysVisibleFor(this) || CanAlwaysSee(obj))
1735 return true;
1736
1737 // Creature scripts
1738 if (Creature const* cObj = obj->ToCreature())
1739 {
1740 if (Player const* player = ToPlayer())
1741 {
1742 if (cObj->IsAIEnabled && !cObj->AI()->CanBeSeen(player))
1743 {
1744 return false;
1745 }
1746
1747 ConditionList conditions = sConditionMgr->GetConditionsForNotGroupedEntry(CONDITION_SOURCE_TYPE_CREATURE_VISIBILITY, cObj->GetEntry());
1748 if (!sConditionMgr->IsObjectMeetToConditions((WorldObject*)this, (WorldObject*)obj, conditions))
1749 {
1750 return false;
1751 }
1752 }
1753 }
1754
1755 // Gameobject scripts
1756 if (GameObject const* goObj = obj->ToGameObject())
1757 {
1758 if (ToPlayer() && !goObj->AI()->CanBeSeen(ToPlayer()))
1759 {
1760 return false;
1761 }
1762 }
1763
1764 // pussywizard: arena spectator
1765 if (obj->IsPlayer())
1766 if (((Player const*)obj)->IsSpectator() && ((Player const*)obj)->FindMap()->IsBattleArena())
1767 return false;
1768
1769 bool corpseVisibility = false;
1770 if (distanceCheck)
1771 {
1772 bool corpseCheck = false;
1773 WorldObject const* viewpoint = this;
1774 if (Player const* thisPlayer = ToPlayer())
1775 {
1776 viewpoint = thisPlayer->GetSeer();
1777
1778 if (Creature const* creature = obj->ToCreature())
1779 {
1780 if (TempSummon const* tempSummon = creature->ToTempSummon())
1781 {
1782 if (tempSummon->IsVisibleBySummonerOnly() && GetGUID() != tempSummon->GetSummonerGUID())
1783 {
1784 return false;
1785 }
1786 }
1787 }
1788
1789 if (thisPlayer->isDead() && thisPlayer->GetHealth() > 0 && // Cheap way to check for ghost state
1790 !(obj->m_serverSideVisibility.GetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GHOST) & m_serverSideVisibility.GetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GHOST) & GHOST_VISIBILITY_GHOST))
1791 {
1792 if (Corpse* corpse = thisPlayer->GetCorpse())
1793 {
1794 corpseCheck = true;
1795 if (corpse->IsWithinDist(thisPlayer, GetSightRange(obj), false))
1796 if (corpse->IsWithinDist(obj, GetSightRange(obj), false))
1797 corpseVisibility = true;
1798 }
1799 }
1800
1801 // our additional checks
1802 if (Unit const* target = obj->ToUnit())
1803 {
1804 // xinef: don't allow to detect vehicle accessory if you can't see vehicle base!
1805 if (Unit const* vehicle = target->GetVehicleBase())
1806 if (!thisPlayer->HaveAtClient(vehicle))
1807 return false;
1808
1809 // pussywizard: during arena preparation, don't allow to detect pets if can't see its owner (spoils enemy arena frames)
1810 if (target->IsPet() && target->GetOwnerGUID() && target->FindMap()->IsBattleArena() && GetGUID() != target->GetOwnerGUID())
1811 if (BattlegroundMap* bgmap = target->FindMap()->ToBattlegroundMap())
1812 if (Battleground* bg = bgmap->GetBG())
1813 if (bg->GetStatus() < STATUS_IN_PROGRESS && !thisPlayer->HaveAtClient(target->GetOwnerGUID()))
1814 return false;
1815 }
1816
1817 if (thisPlayer->GetFarSightDistance() && !thisPlayer->isInFront(obj))
1818 return false;
1819 }
1820
1821 // Xinef: check reversely obj vs viewpoint, object could be a gameObject which overrides _IsWithinDist function to include gameobject size
1822 if (!corpseCheck && !viewpoint->IsWithinDist(obj, GetSightRange(obj), false))
1823 return false;
1824 }
1825
1826 // GM visibility off or hidden NPC
1827 if (!obj->m_serverSideVisibility.GetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GM))
1828 {
1829 // Stop checking other things for GMs
1830 if (m_serverSideVisibilityDetect.GetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GM))
1831 return true;
1832 }
1833 else
1834 return m_serverSideVisibilityDetect.GetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GM) >= obj->m_serverSideVisibility.GetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GM);
1835
1836 // Ghost players, Spirit Healers, and some other NPCs
1837 if (!corpseVisibility && !(obj->m_serverSideVisibility.GetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GHOST) & m_serverSideVisibilityDetect.GetValue(SERVERSIDE_VISIBILITY_GHOST)))
1838 {
1839 // Alive players can see dead players in some cases, but other objects can't do that
1840 if (Player const* thisPlayer = ToPlayer())
1841 {
1842 if (Player const* objPlayer = obj->ToPlayer())
1843 {
1844 if (thisPlayer->GetTeamId() != objPlayer->GetTeamId() || !thisPlayer->IsGroupVisibleFor(objPlayer))
1845 return false;
1846 }
1847 else
1848 return false;
1849 }
1850 else
1851 return false;
1852 }
1853
1854 if (obj->IsInvisibleDueToDespawn())
1855 return false;
1856
1857 // pussywizard: arena spectator
1858 if (this->IsPlayer())
1859 if (((Player const*)this)->IsSpectator() && ((Player const*)this)->FindMap()->IsBattleArena() && (obj->m_invisibility.GetFlags() || obj->m_stealth.GetFlags()))
1860 return false;
1861
1862 if (!CanDetect(obj, ignoreStealth, !distanceCheck, checkAlert))
1863 {
1864 return false;
1865 }
1866
1867 return true;
1868}

◆ DestroyForVisiblePlayers()

void WorldObject::DestroyForVisiblePlayers ( )
2941{
2942 if (!IsInWorld())
2943 return;
2944
2945 VisiblePlayersMap& visiblePlayerMap = GetObjectVisibilityContainer().GetVisiblePlayersMap();
2946 for (VisiblePlayersMap::iterator itr = visiblePlayerMap.begin(); itr != visiblePlayerMap.end();)
2947 {
2948 Player* player = itr->second;
2949

2951
2952 // Clean up visibility references now
2953 itr = GetObjectVisibilityContainer().UnlinkVisibilityFromWorldObject(player, itr);
2954 }
2955}

◆ GetClosePoint()

bool WorldObject::GetClosePoint ( float &  x,
float &  y,
float &  z,
float  size,
float  distance2d = 0,
float  angle = 0,
WorldObject const *  forWho = nullptr,
bool  force = false 
) const
2711{
2712 // angle calculated from current orientation
2713 GetNearPoint(forWho, x, y, z, size, distance2d, GetOrientation() + angle);
2714
2715 if (std::fabs(this->GetPositionZ() - z) > 3.0f || !IsWithinLOS(x, y, z))
2716 {
2717 x = this->GetPositionX();
2718 y = this->GetPositionY();
2719 z = this->GetPositionZ();
2720 if (forWho)
2721 if (Unit const* u = forWho->ToUnit())
2722 u->UpdateAllowedPositionZ(x, y, z);
2723 }
2724 float maxDist = GetObjectSize() + size + distance2d + 1.0f;
2725 if (GetExactDistSq(x, y, z) >= maxDist * maxDist)
2726 {
2727 if (force)
2728 {
2729 x = this->GetPositionX();
2730 y = this->GetPositionY();
2731 z = this->GetPositionZ();
2732 return true;
2733 }
2734 return false;
2735 }
2736 return true;
2737}

◆ GetDistanceOrder()

bool WorldObject::GetDistanceOrder ( WorldObject const *  obj1,
WorldObject const *  obj2,
bool  is3D = true 
) const
1408{
1409 float dx1 = GetPositionX() - obj1->GetPositionX();
1410 float dy1 = GetPositionY() - obj1->GetPositionY();
1411 float distsq1 = dx1 * dx1 + dy1 * dy1;
1412 if (is3D)
1413 {
1414 float dz1 = GetPositionZ() - obj1->GetPositionZ();
1415 distsq1 += dz1 * dz1;
1416 }
1417
1418 float dx2 = GetPositionX() - obj2->GetPositionX();
1419 float dy2 = GetPositionY() - obj2->GetPositionY();
1420 float distsq2 = dx2 * dx2 + dy2 * dy2;
1421 if (is3D)
1422 {
1423 float dz2 = GetPositionZ() - obj2->GetPositionZ();
1424 distsq2 += dz2 * dz2;
1425 }
1426
1427 return distsq1 < distsq2;
1428}

References Position::GetPositionX(), Position::GetPositionY(), and Position::GetPositionZ().

Referenced by Acore::ObjectDistanceOrderPred::operator()(), and Spell::SearchChainTargets().

◆ GetDistanceZ()

float WorldObject::GetDistanceZ ( WorldObject const *  obj) const
1221{
1222 float dz = std::fabs(GetPositionZ() - obj->GetPositionZ());
1223 float sizefactor = GetObjectSize() + obj->GetObjectSize();
1224 float dist = dz - sizefactor;
1225 return (dist > 0 ? dist : 0);
1226}

Position WorldObject::GetFirstCollisionPosition ( float  destX,
float  destY,
float  destZ 
)
2848{
2849 Position pos = GetPosition();
2850 auto distance = GetExactDistSq(destX,destY,destZ);
2851

2853 auto dy = destY - pos.GetPositionY();
2854

2856 ang = (ang >= 0) ? ang : 2 * M_PI + ang;
2857

2859 return pos;
2860}

)
2833{

2835 auto dy = destY - startY;

1652 {
1653 if (ToPlayer()->GetCinematicMgr()->IsOnCinematic())
1654 {
1655 return DEFAULT_VISIBILITY_INSTANCE;
1656 }

1662 }

◆ GetHitSpherePointFor() [2/2]

Position WorldObject::GetHitSpherePointFor ( Position const &  dest,
Optional< float >  collisionHeight = { },
Optional< float >  combatReach = { } 
) const
1263{
1264 G3D::Vector3 vThis(GetPositionX(), GetPositionY(), GetPositionZ() + (collisionHeight ? *collisionHeight : GetCollisionHeight()));
1265 G3D::Vector3 vObj(dest.GetPositionX(), dest.GetPositionY(), dest.GetPositionZ());
1266 G3D::Vector3 contactPoint = vThis + (vObj - vThis).directionOrZero() * std::min(dest.GetExactDist(this), (combatReach ? *combatReach : GetCombatReach()));
1267
1268 return Position(contactPoint.x, contactPoint.y, contactPoint.z, GetAngle(contactPoint.x, contactPoint.y));
1269}

◆ GetMinHeightInWater()

float WorldObject::GetMinHeightInWater ( ) const

Get the minimum height of a object that should be in water to start floating/swim.

Returns
float
1570{
1571 // have a fun with Archimedes' formula
1572 auto height = GetCollisionHeight();
1573 auto width = GetCollisionWidth();
1574 auto weight = getWeight(height, width, 1040); // avg human specific weight
1575 auto heightOutOfWater = getOutOfWater(width, weight, 10202) * 4.0f; // avg human density
1576 auto heightInWater = height - heightOutOfWater;
1577 return (height > heightInWater ? heightInWater : (height - (height / 3)));
1578}
getWeight

◆ GetNearPoint()

void WorldObject::GetNearPoint ( WorldObject const *  searcher,
float &  x,
float &  y,
float &  z,
float  searcher_size,
float  distance2d,
float  absAngle,
float  controlZ = 0,
Position const *  startPos = nullptr 
) const
2638{
2639 GetNearPoint2D(x, y, distance2d + searcher_size, absAngle, startPos);
2640 z = GetPositionZ();
2641
2642 if (searcher)
2643 {
2644 if (Unit const* unit = searcher->ToUnit(); Unit const* target = ToUnit())
2645 {
2646 if (unit && target && unit->IsInWater() && target->IsInWater())
2647 {
2648 // if the searcher is in water
2649 // we have no ground so we can
2650 // set the target height to the
2651 // z-coord to keep the searcher
2652 // at the correct height (face to face)
2653 z += GetCollisionHeight() - unit->GetCollisionHeight();
2654 }
2655 }
2656 searcher->UpdateAllowedPositionZ(x, y, z);
2657 }
2658 else
2659 {
2660 UpdateAllowedPositionZ(x, y, z);
2661 }
2662
2663 // if detection disabled, return first point
2664 if (!sWorld->getBoolConfig(CONFIG_DETECT_POS_COLLISION))
2665 return;
2666
2667 // return if the point is already in LoS
2668 if (!controlZ && IsWithinLOS(x, y, z))
2669 return;
2670
2671 // remember first point
2672 float first_x = x;
2673 float first_y = y;
2674 float first_z = z;
2675
2676 // loop in a circle to look for a point in LoS using small steps
2677 for (float angle = float(M_PI) / 8; angle < float(M_PI) * 2; angle += float(M_PI) / 8)
2678 {
2679 GetNearPoint2D(x, y, distance2d + searcher_size, absAngle + angle, startPos);
2680 z = GetPositionZ();
2681 UpdateAllowedPositionZ(x, y, z);
2682 if (controlZ && fabsf(GetPositionZ() - z) > controlZ)
2683 continue;
2684
2685 if (IsWithinLOS(x, y, z))
2686 return;
2687 }
2688
2689 // still not in LoS, give up and return first position found
2690 if (startPos)
2691 {
2692 x = searcher->GetPositionX();
2693 y = searcher->GetPositionY();
2694 z = searcher->GetPositionZ();
2695 }
2696 else
2697 {
2698 x = first_x;
2699 y = first_y;
2700 z = first_z;
2701 }
2702}

◆ GetNearPoint2D() [2/2]

void WorldObject::GetNearPoint2D ( WorldObject const *  searcher,
float &  x,
float &  y,
float  distance,
float  absAngle,
Position const *  startPos = nullptr 
) const
2601{
2602 float effectiveReach = GetCombatReach();
2603
2604 if (searcher)
2605 {
2606 effectiveReach += searcher->GetCombatReach();
2607
2608 if (this != searcher)
2609 {
2610 float myHover = 0.0f, searcherHover = 0.0f;
2611 if (Unit const* unit = ToUnit())
2612 myHover = unit->GetHoverHeight();
2613 if (Unit const* searchUnit = searcher->ToUnit())
2614 searcherHover = searchUnit->GetHoverHeight();
2615
2616 float hoverDelta = myHover - searcherHover;
2617 if (hoverDelta != 0.0f)
2618 effectiveReach = std::sqrt(std::max(effectiveReach * effectiveReach - hoverDelta * hoverDelta, 0.0f));
2619 }
2620 }
2621
2622 float positionX = startPos ? startPos->GetPositionX() : GetPositionX();
2623 float positionY = startPos ? startPos->GetPositionY() : GetPositionY();
2624
2625 x = positionX + (effectiveReach + distance2d) * std::cos(absAngle);
2626 y = positionY + (effectiveReach + distance2d) * std::sin(absAngle);
2627
2628 Acore::NormalizeMapCoord(x);
2629 Acore::NormalizeMapCoord(y);
2630}
Acore::NormalizeMapCoord

Definition GridDefines.h:202

void WorldObject::GetRandomPoint ( const Position &  srcPos,

) const

1535
1536 // angle to face `obj` to `this`
1537 float angle = (float)rand_norm() * static_cast<float>(2 * M_PI);
1538 float new_dist = (float)rand_norm() * static_cast<float>(distance);
1539
1540 rand_x = pos.m_positionX + new_dist * cos(angle);
1541 rand_y = pos.m_positionY + new_dist * std::sin(angle);
1542 rand_z = pos.m_positionZ;
1543
1544 Acore::NormalizeMapCoord(rand_x);
1545 Acore::NormalizeMapCoord(rand_y);
1546 UpdateGroundPositionZ(rand_x, rand_y, rand_z); // update to LOS height if available
1547}
WorldObject::UpdateGroundPositionZ
void UpdateGroundPositionZ(float x, float y, float &z) const
Definition Object.cpp:1556

References Position::GetPosition(), Position::m_positionX, Position::m_positionY, Position::m_positionZ, Acore::NormalizeMapCoord(), rand_norm(), and UpdateGroundPositionZ().

◆ GetSightRange()

float WorldObject::GetSightRange ( WorldObject const *  target = nullptr) const
virtual

Reimplemented in Player.

1689{
1690 if (ToUnit())
1691 {
1692 if (ToPlayer())
1693 {
1694 if (target)
1695 {
1696 if (target->IsCreature() && target->IsVisibilityOverridden())
1697 return target->GetVisibilityOverrideDistance();
1698 else if (target->IsGameObject())
1699 {
1700 if (IsInWintergrasp() && target->IsInWintergrasp())
1701 return VISIBILITY_DIST_WINTERGRASP;
1702 else if (target->IsVisibilityOverridden())
1703 return target->GetVisibilityOverrideDistance();
1704 else if (ToPlayer()->GetCinematicMgr()->IsOnCinematic())
1705 return DEFAULT_VISIBILITY_INSTANCE;
1706 else
1707 return GetMap()->GetVisibilityRange();
1708 }
1709
1710 return IsInWintergrasp() && target->IsInWintergrasp() ? VISIBILITY_DIST_WINTERGRASP : GetMap()->GetVisibilityRange();
1711 }
1712 return IsInWintergrasp() ? VISIBILITY_DIST_WINTERGRASP : GetMap()->GetVisibilityRange();
1713 }
1714 else if (ToCreature())
1715 return ToCreature()->m_SightDistance;
1716 else
1717 return SIGHT_RANGE_UNIT;
1718 }
1719
1720 if (ToDynObject() && isActiveObject())
1721 return GetMap()->GetVisibilityRange();
1722
1723 return 0.0f;
1724}

◆ IsInBetween()

bool WorldObject::IsInBetween ( WorldObject const *  obj1,
WorldObject const *  obj2,
float  size = 0 
) const
1497{
1498 if (!obj1 || !obj2)
1499 return false;
1500
1501 if (!size)
1502 size = GetObjectSize() / 2;
1503
1504 float pdist = obj1->GetExactDist2dSq(obj2) + size / 2.0f;
1505 if (GetExactDist2dSq(obj1) >= pdist || GetExactDist2dSq(obj2) >= pdist)
1506 return false;
1507
1508 if (G3D::fuzzyEq(obj1->GetPositionX(), obj2->GetPositionX()))
1509 return GetPositionX() >= obj1->GetPositionX() - size && GetPositionX() <= obj1->GetPositionX() + size;
1510
1511 float A = (obj2->GetPositionY() - obj1->GetPositionY()) / (obj2->GetPositionX() - obj1->GetPositionX());
1512 float B = -1;
1513 float C = obj1->GetPositionY() - A * obj1->GetPositionX();
1514 float dist = std::fabs(A * GetPositionX() + B * GetPositionY() + C) / std::sqrt(A * A + B * B);
1515 return dist <= size;
1516}
Position::GetExactDist2dSq
float GetExactDist2dSq(const float x, const float y) const
Definition Position.h:161

References Position::GetExactDist2dSq(), GetObjectSize(), Position::GetPositionX(), and Position::GetPositionY().

◆ IsInRange()

bool WorldObject::IsInRange ( WorldObject const *  obj,
float  minRange,
float  maxRange,
bool  is3D = true 
) const
1431{
1432 float dx = GetPositionX() - obj->GetPositionX();
1433 float dy = GetPositionY() - obj->GetPositionY();
1434 float distsq = dx * dx + dy * dy;
1435 if (is3D)
1436 {
1437 float dz = GetPositionZ() - obj->GetPositionZ();
1438 distsq += dz * dz;
1439 }
1440
1441 float sizefactor = GetObjectSize() + obj->GetObjectSize();
1442
1443 // check only for real range
1444 if (minRange > 0.0f)
1445 {
1446 float mindist = minRange + sizefactor;
1447 if (distsq < mindist * mindist)
1448 return false;
1449 }
1450
1451 float maxdist = maxRange + sizefactor;
1452 return distsq < maxdist * maxdist;
1453}

References GetObjectSize(), Position::GetPositionX(), Position::GetPositionY(), and Position::GetPositionZ().

Referenced by SmartScript::GetTargets(), npc_anachronos_the_ancient::npc_anachronos_the_ancientAI::HandleAnimation(), RangeSelector::operator()(), SmartScript::ProcessEvent(), npc_varian_wrynn::npc_varian_wrynnAI::UpdateAI(), npc_thrall_bfu::npc_thrall_bfuAI::UpdateAI(), boss_grand_champion::boss_grand_championAI::UpdateAI(), and boss_gathios_the_shatterer::UpdateAI().

◆ IsInRange2d()

bool WorldObject::IsInRange2d ( float  x,
float  y,
float  minRange,
float  maxRange 
) const
1456{
1457 float dx = GetPositionX() - x;
1458 float dy = GetPositionY() - y;
1459 float distsq = dx * dx + dy * dy;
1460
1461 float sizefactor = GetObjectSize();
1462
1463 // check only for real range
1464 if (minRange > 0.0f)
1465 {
1466 float mindist = minRange + sizefactor;
1467 if (distsq < mindist * mindist)
1468 return false;
1469 }
1470
1471 float maxdist = maxRange + sizefactor;
1472 return distsq < maxdist * maxdist;
1473}

References GetObjectSize(), Position::GetPositionX(), and Position::GetPositionY().

◆ IsInRange3d()

bool WorldObject::IsInRange3d ( float  x,
float  y,
float  z,
float  minRange,
float  maxRange 
) const
1476{
1477 float dx = GetPositionX() - x;
1478 float dy = GetPositionY() - y;
1479 float dz = GetPositionZ() - z;
1480 float distsq = dx * dx + dy * dy + dz * dz;
1481
1482 float sizefactor = GetObjectSize();
1483
1484 // check only for real range
1485 if (minRange > 0.0f)
1486 {
1487 float mindist = minRange + sizefactor;
1488 if (distsq < mindist * mindist)
1489 return false;
1490 }
1491
1492 float maxdist = maxRange + sizefactor;
1493 return distsq < maxdist * maxdist;
1494}

References GetObjectSize(), Position::GetPositionX(), Position::GetPositionY(), and Position::GetPositionZ().

) const

1355 {
1356 oz += GetCollisionHeight();

1376 return false;
1377

1382 oz += obj->GetCollisionHeight();
1383 }

◆ MovePosition()

void WorldObject::MovePosition ( Position &  pos,
float  dist,
float  angle 
)
2788{
2789 angle += GetOrientation();
2790 float destx, desty, destz, ground, floor;
2791 destx = pos.m_positionX + dist * cos(angle);
2792 desty = pos.m_positionY + dist * std::sin(angle);
2793
2794 // Prevent invalid coordinates here, position is unchanged
2795 if (!Acore::IsValidMapCoord(destx, desty))
2796 {
2797 LOG_FATAL("entities.object", "WorldObject::MovePosition invalid coordinates X: {} and Y: {} were passed!", destx, desty);
2798 return;
2799 }
2800
2801 ground = GetMapHeight(destx, desty, MAX_HEIGHT);
2802 floor = GetMapHeight(destx, desty, pos.m_positionZ);
2803 destz = std::fabs(ground - pos.m_positionZ) <= std::fabs(floor - pos.m_positionZ) ? ground : floor;
2804
2805 float step = dist / 10.0f;
2806
2807 for (uint8 j = 0; j < 10; ++j)
2808 {
2809 // do not allow too big z changes
2810 if (std::fabs(pos.m_positionZ - destz) > 6.0f)
2811 {
2812 destx -= step * cos(angle);
2813 desty -= step * std::sin(angle);
2814 ground = GetMapHeight(destx, desty, MAX_HEIGHT);
2815 floor = GetMapHeight(destx, desty, pos.m_positionZ);
2816 destz = std::fabs(ground - pos.m_positionZ) <= std::fabs(floor - pos.m_positionZ) ? ground : floor;
2817 }
2818 // we have correct destz now
2819 else
2820 {
2821 pos.Relocate(destx, desty, destz);
2822 break;
2823 }
2824 }
2825
2826 Acore::NormalizeMapCoord(pos.m_positionX);
2827 Acore::NormalizeMapCoord(pos.m_positionY);
2828 UpdateGroundPositionZ(pos.m_positionX, pos.m_positionY, pos.m_positionZ);
2829 pos.SetOrientation(GetOrientation());
2830}

◆ MovePositionToFirstCollision()

void WorldObject::MovePositionToFirstCollision ( Position &  pos,

float  angle 
)
2870{
2871 angle += GetOrientation();
2872 float destx, desty, destz;
2873 destx = pos.m_positionX + dist * cos(angle);
2874 desty = pos.m_positionY + dist * std::sin(angle);

◆ SetVisibilityDistanceOverride()

void WorldObject::SetVisibilityDistanceOverride ( VisibilityDistanceType  type)
1085{
1086 ASSERT(type < VisibilityDistanceType::Max);
1087
1088 if (type == GetVisibilityOverrideType())
1089 return;
1090
1091 if (!IsCreature() && !IsGameObject() && !IsDynamicObject())
1092 return;
1093
1094 // Important to remove from old visibility override containers first
1095 RemoveFromMapVisibilityOverrideContainers();
1096
1097 // Always update _visibilityDistanceOverrideType, even when not in world
1098 _visibilityDistanceOverrideType = type;
1099
1100 // Finally, add to new visibility override containers
1101 AddToMapVisibilityOverrideContainers();
1102}

Definition Object.cpp:1118

◆ SummonCreatureGroup()

void WorldObject::SummonCreatureGroup ( uint8  group,
std::list< TempSummon * > *  list = nullptr 
)

Summons group of creatures. Should be called only by instances of Creature and GameObject classes.

Parameters
groupId of group to summon.
listList to store pointers to summoned creatures.
2430{
2431 ASSERT((IsGameObject() || IsCreature()) && "Only GOs and creatures can summon npc groups!");
2432
2433 std::vector<TempSummonData> const* data = sObjectMgr->GetSummonGroup(GetEntry(), IsGameObject() ? SUMMONER_TYPE_GAMEOBJECT : SUMMONER_TYPE_CREATURE, group);
2434 if (!data)
2435 return;
2436
2437 for (std::vector<TempSummonData>::const_iterator itr = data->begin(); itr != data->end(); ++itr)
2438 if (TempSummon* summon = SummonCreature(itr->entry, itr->pos, itr->type, itr->time))
2439 if (list)
2440 list->push_back(summon);
2441}

2367{
2368 if (!IsInWorld())
2369 return nullptr;
2370
2371 GameObjectTemplate const* goinfo = sObjectMgr->GetGameObjectTemplate(entry);
2372 if (!goinfo)
2373 {
2374 LOG_ERROR("sql.sql", "Gameobject template {} not found in database!", entry);
2375 return nullptr;
2376 }
2377

2381 {
2382 delete go;
2383 return nullptr;
2384 }

2391

2393 ToUnit()->AddGameObject(go);
2394 else
2395 go->SetSpawnedByDefault(false);
2396

2398 return go;
2399}

◆ UpdateAllowedPositionZ()

void WorldObject::UpdateAllowedPositionZ ( float  x,
float  y,
float &  z,
float *  groundZ = nullptr 
) const
1581{
1582 if (GetTransport())
1583 {
1584 if (groundZ)
1585 *groundZ = z;
1586
1587 return;
1588 }
1589
1590 if (Unit const* unit = ToUnit())
1591 {
1592 if (!unit->CanFly())
1593 {
1594 Creature const* c = unit->ToCreature();
1595 bool canSwim = c ? c->CanSwim() : true;
1596 float ground_z = z;
1597 float max_z;
1598 if (canSwim)
1599 max_z = GetMapWaterOrGroundLevel(x, y, z, &ground_z);
1600 else
1601 max_z = ground_z = GetMapHeight(x, y, z);
1602
1603 if (max_z > INVALID_HEIGHT)
1604 {
1605 if (canSwim && unit->GetMap()->IsInWater(unit->GetPhaseMask(), x, y, max_z - Z_OFFSET_FIND_HEIGHT, unit->GetCollisionHeight()))
1606 {
1607 // do not allow creatures to walk on
1608 // water level while swimming
1609 max_z = std::max(max_z - GetMinHeightInWater(), ground_z);
1610 }
1611 else
1612 {
1613 // hovering units cannot go below their hover height
1614 float hoverOffset = unit->GetHoverHeight();
1615 max_z += hoverOffset;
1616 ground_z += hoverOffset;
1617 }
1618
1619 if (z > max_z)
1620 z = max_z;
1621 else if (z < ground_z)
1622 z = ground_z;
1623 }
1624
1625 if (groundZ)
1626 *groundZ = ground_z;
1627 }
1628 else
1629 {
1630 float ground_z = GetMapHeight(x, y, z) + unit->GetHoverHeight();
1631 if (z < ground_z)
1632 z = ground_z;
1633
1634 if (groundZ)
1635 *groundZ = ground_z;
1636 }
1637 }
1638 else
1639 {
1640 float ground_z = GetMapHeight(x, y, z);
1641 if (ground_z > INVALID_HEIGHT)
1642 z = ground_z;
1643
1644 if (groundZ)
1645 *groundZ = ground_z;
1646 }
1647}

bool CanSwim() const override
This method check the current flag/status of a creature and its inhabit type.
Definition Creature.cpp:3194
